WorkItem.ClosedComment: Ahmad checked in this feature a while ago.
WorkItem.Description:
From Fishbowl for Facebook page:
 
http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=148573025964&ref=mf#/topic.php?uid=148573025964&topic=14378
 
A nice feature would be if mini-mode could run as a slide show cycling through your friends' most recent status updates. Or can this be done already?
--
I didn't find mini-mode that useful at its present state. I must scroll between too many status updates and feeds, and in such a small screen it is completely useless. If it could work automatically it would be better.
